name: MixedNUTS: Training-Free Accuracy-Robustness Balance via Nonlinearly Mixed Classifiers
authors: Yatong Bai, Mo Zhou, Vishal M. Patel, Somayeh Sojoudi
footnote: It uses an ensemble of networks. The robust base classifier uses 50M synthetic images. 69.71% robust accuracy is due to the original evaluation (Adaptive AutoAttack)
